00049 int main (void)
00050 {       
00051         int n;
00052 #if ENABLE_SPEAKER_TEST
00053         timestruct_t timestruct;
00054         double texec;
00055 #endif //ENABLE_SPEAKER_TEST
00056 
00057         // Permissão para acessar I/O
00058 #if ENABLE_SPEAKER_TEST
00059         if(iopl(3)!=0){
00060                 printf("\nErro em ioperm: ");
00061                 int errsv = errno;
00062                 switch(errsv){
00063                 case EINVAL:
00064                         printf("level is greater than 3");
00065                         break;
00066                 case ENOSYS:
00067                         printf("level is greater than 3.");
00068                         break;
00069                 case EPERM:
00070                         printf("The calling process has insufficient privilege to call iopl(); the CAP_SYS_RAWIO capability is required.");
00071                         break;
00072                 }
00073                 return EXIT_FAILURE;
00074         }
00075         outb_p(inb_p(SPEAKER_CNTRL) & 0xFE, SPEAKER_CNTRL);
00076 
00077         time_reset(&timestruct);
00078         outb_p(inb_p(SPEAKER_CNTRL) ^ 0x02, SPEAKER_CNTRL);
00079         texec = time_gettime(&timestruct);
00080 
00081         printf("\n Tempo decorrido em teste de E/S: %f us",1e6*texec); 
00082 #endif //ENABLE_SPEAKER_TEST
00083 
00084         // Data logger:
00085         if(!gDataLogger_Init(&gDataLogger,"matlabdatafiles/gmatlabdatafile.mat",NULL)){
00086                 printf("\nErro em gDataLogger_Init\n\n");
00087                 return EXIT_FAILURE;
00088         }
00089 
00090         gDataLogger_DeclareVariable(&gDataLogger,"t","s",1,1,1000);
00091         gDataLogger_DeclareVariable(&gDataLogger,"y1","m",1,1,1000);
00092         gDataLogger_DeclareVariable(&gDataLogger,"y2","m",1,1,1000);
00093         gDataLogger_DeclareVariable(&gDataLogger,"y3","m",1,1,1000);
00094         gDataLogger_DeclareVariable(&gDataLogger,"MatA","s",3,1,1000);
00095         gDataLogger_DeclareVariable(&gDataLogger,"MatB","m",4,2,1000);
00096 
00097         // La�o principal
00098     timer_start ();
00099 
00100         n = 0;
00101         while(!kbhit()){
00102                 usleep(20000);
00103                 gDataLogger_IPCUpdate(&gDataLogger); // gerencia IPC
00104                 if(++n>10){
00105                         gDataLogger_MatfileUpdate(&gDataLogger); // esvazia os buffers no arquivo de log
00106                         printf("\n Tempo decorrido: %f s. Tglobal = %f ms. counter = %li",tempo,Tglobal*1000,counter);
00107                         n = 0;
00108                 }
00109         }
00110         printf("\n");
00111 
00112     timer_stop ();
00113 
00114         // Encerramento do data logger:
00115         gDataLogger_Close(&gDataLogger);
00116 
00117     return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00118 }

00120 void timer_start (void)
00121 {
00122     struct itimerspec itimer = { { 1, 0 }, { 1, 0 } };
00123     struct sigevent sigev;
00124 
00125     itimer.it_interval.tv_sec=0;
00126     itimer.it_interval.tv_nsec=TASK_PERIOD_US * 1000; 
00127     itimer.it_value=itimer.it_interval;
00128 
00129     memset (&sigev, 0, sizeof (struct sigevent));
00130     sigev.sigev_value.sival_int = timer_nr;
00131     sigev.sigev_notify = SIGEV_THREAD;
00132     sigev.sigev_notify_attributes = NULL;
00133     sigev.sigev_notify_function = timer_function;
00134 
00135     if (timer_create (CLOCK_REALTIME, &sigev, &timer) < 0)
00136     {
00137         fprintf (stderr, "[%d]: %s\n", __LINE__, strerror (errno));
00138         exit (errno);
00139     }
00140 
00141     if (timer_settime (timer, 0, &itimer, NULL) < 0)
00142     {
00143         fprintf (stderr, "[%d]: %s\n", __LINE__, strerror (errno));
00144         exit (errno);
00145     }
00146 }
00147 
00148 void timer_stop (void)
00149 {
00150     if (timer_delete (timer) < 0)
00151     {
00152         fprintf (stderr, "[%d]: %s\n", __LINE__, strerror (errno));
00153         exit (errno);
00154     }
00155 }
00156 
00157 void timer_function (union sigval sigval)
00158 { 
00159         static int flagfirstexecution = 1,i,j;
00160         double T,y1,y2,y3;
00161         static timestruct_t timestruct;
00162 
00163         // Calculo das variaveis
00164         if(flagfirstexecution){
00165                 flagfirstexecution = 0;
00166                 T = 0.0;
00167         } else {
00168                 T = time_gettime(&timestruct);
00169         }
00170         time_reset(&timestruct);
00171         tempo += T;
00172         y1 = tempo;
00173         y2 = sin(2*3.1415926*tempo);
00174         y3 = cos(2*3.1415926*tempo);
00175         Tglobal = T;
00176 
00177         MatA[0][0] = y1;
00178         MatA[1][0] = y2;
00179         MatA[2][0] = y3;
00180 
00181         for (i=0;i<4;++i){
00182                 for (j=0;j<2;++j){
00183                         MatB[i][j] = i*j;
00184                 }
00185         }
00186         ++counter;
00187 
00188         // Inserir na fila
00189         gDataLogger_InsertVariable(&gDataLogger,"t",(double *)&tempo);
00190         gDataLogger_InsertVariable(&gDataLogger,"y1",&y1);
00191         gDataLogger_InsertVariable(&gDataLogger,"y2",&y2);
00192         gDataLogger_InsertVariable(&gDataLogger,"y3",&y3);
00193         gDataLogger_InsertVariable(&gDataLogger,"MatA",&MatA[0][0]);
00194         gDataLogger_InsertVariable(&gDataLogger,"MatB",&MatB[0][0]);
00195 
00196         // Teste com alto-falante do PC: gera uma onda quadrada com periodo igual ao dobro do periodo da tarefa
00197 #if ENABLE_SPEAKER_TEST
00198 //      outb(inb(SPEAKER_CNTRL) ^ 0x02, SPEAKER_CNTRL);
00199         outb_p(inb_p(SPEAKER_CNTRL) ^ 0x02, SPEAKER_CNTRL);
00200 #endif //ENABLE_SPEAKER_TEST
00201 }

00203 /**********************************************************************
00204  **** Gerenciamento do teclado
00205  *********************************************************************/
00206 int kbhit(void)
00207 {
00208         struct termios oldt, newt;
00209         int ch;
00210         int oldf;
00211 
00212         tcgetattr(STDIN_FILENO, &oldt);
00213         newt = oldt;
00214         newt.c_lflag &= ~(ICANON | ECHO);
00215         tcsetattr(STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &newt);
00216         oldf = fcntl(STDIN_FILENO, F_GETFL, 0);
00217         fcntl(STDIN_FILENO, F_SETFL, oldf | O_NONBLOCK);
00218 
00219         ch = getchar();
00220 
00221         tcsetattr(STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &oldt);
00222         fcntl(STDIN_FILENO, F_SETFL, oldf);
00223 
00224         if(ch != EOF)
00225         {
00226         ungetc(ch, stdin);
00227         return 1;
00228         }
00229 
00230         return 0;
00231 }
00232 
00233 int getch(void)
00234 {
00235         struct termios oldt,
00236         newt;
00237         int ch;
00238         tcgetattr( STDIN_FILENO, &oldt );
00239         newt = oldt;
00240         newt.c_lflag &= ~( ICANON | ECHO );
00241         tcsetattr( STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &newt );
00242         ch = getchar();
00243         tcsetattr( STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &oldt );
00244         return ch;
00245 }
